meanings.definition: To surpass in topping or excelling.
meanings.sent1: She always manages to outtop her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: The athlete trained hard to outtop his personal best in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to outtop the birds in reaching the top of the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to practice helped her outtop the competition.
meanings.sent5: The sun's brightness outtops all the stars in the sky.

meanings.definition: To rise above or stand out among others.
meanings.sent1: His kindness and generosity outtop everyone in the community.
meanings.sent2: The colorful flowers outtopped the green leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The clown's funny antics always manage to outtop the serious magician.
meanings.sent4: Her voice outtops all others in the choir, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountain outtops the surrounding hills, creating a breathtaking view.
